column5:
Men, I can not even begin to understand this. Wtf is wrong with people. The fact that you are walking the earth is like... Just tremendous amount of respect for you.

Anyhow... Aside from contacting police and stuff, you got to do somethinf for you mental health. Ofcourse counseling and stuff is something you can do but after reading this I was thinking.. Maybe you need to do a soort like kickboxing.

With that you can get your strength back, mentally (and physically getting strong) togethet with counseling. I think talking about it alone won't be good enough. You need to feel strong about yourself. I hope you seriously consider this..

Much love.
